# NSScrubber.Mode.free

**Case**

A scrolling mode in which the scrubber scrolls as the user swipes horizontally across the scrubber.

## Declaration

```swift
case free
```

## Discussion

When a user swipes horizontally across the scrubber, the scrubber scrolls. To select an item, the user must tap or press it without moving their finger horizontally.

Free-mode interaction changes depending on the value the scrubber’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubber/isContinuous] property. For details on how to choose the correct mode for your app, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScrubber#Choose-a-scrubber-touch-interaction-model].

## Constants

- **NSScrubber.Mode.fixed**: A scrolling mode in which scrubber items remain fixed in place, and the item under the user’s finger is highlighted.
